Sobre mim

Hi, I'm 25 years old, brazilian and work as front-end developer. Currently working at Ingresso.com

Studying Computer Science and working with software development for 4 years.

Always looking for new technologies and open source projects.

What I do?

  • Development

    Of course, my core business. I have been working mostly with Javascript, but have knowledge in PHP and Java. I'm interested in study patterns and performance problems. If there is a pattern or a better way to do it, please show me.

  • Consulting

    Need an upgrade? Problems with SEO, slow loading, applications building process, workflow and browser compatibility is what I do.

  • Plus

    Thanks to my minor design classes at college, I've learned fundamentals that is important in my job today. Making a user friendly application is important not just for business point of view, but for the user for real. Make an app as if you were to use it!
